title: Motion pictures produced by American Mutoscope and Biograph Company, 1903-1904
brief_description:
Compilation of silent motion pictures produced by Amwerican Mutoscope and Biograph Company.
Contents: A Search for the evidence (1903)—The Moonshiner (1904)—The Hero of Liao Yang (1904)
Films restored from the Library of Congress paper prints.
